mapper.insert: insert into qna values(qna_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, qna_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select title, writer, contents, reg_date, hit, ref, step, depth from qna where num=#{num}
select * from (select rownum R, Q.* from (select * from qna order by num desc) Q) where R between 1 and 10
